This method is to reduce strength of brick.
impact() - Method in class model.SteelBrick
This method is to reduce strength of brick if the random number generated is less than the broken probability of steel brick.

InfoPageController - Class in controller
This is InfoPageController class which receives an input from the user via the InfoPageView, then processes the user's data with the help of InfoPageModel and updates InfoPageView.

This is a constructor to initialise variables in InfoPageController class.

InfoPageModel object
InfoPageModel - Class in model
This is InfoPageModel class which is used to define info page model and allows other classes to get and set value for InfoPageView object.

This is a constructor for InfoPageModel which is used to initialise some variables in InfoPageModel class.

infoPageView - Variable in class controller.InfoPageController
InfoPageView object
InfoPageView - Class in view
This is InfoPageView class which displays the description of the game and instruction.
InfoPageView(InfoPageModel) - Constructor for class view.InfoPageView
This is a constructor to design info page, add ActionListener, and initialise some variables in InfoPageView class.
initialiseSpeed() - Method in class model.Wall
This method is to set initial speed in x and y direction of ball.
initialize() - Method in class view.DebugConsole
This method is to set up the dialog window.
initialize() - Method in class view.DebugPanel
This method is to set background color of this DebugPanel container to white and set the layout manager for this container as GridLayout with 2 rows and 2 columns.
initialize() - Method in class view.GameBoardView
This method is to set the preferred size of this component, set this component focusable and add some listeners to this component so that actions can be performed accordingly.
initialize() - Method in class view.GameFrame
This method sets the title of this frame, set the operation that will happen when user initialises a "close" on this frame, in this case is to exit the application.

isActionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.InfoPageController
If user clicks the start button, the info page frame will be disposed and enableGameBoard method in GameFrame class will be called to display the game board.
isBallLost() - Method in class model.Wall
This method checks if the ball is lost.
isBallLostTest() - Method in class model.WallTest
This method tests for isBallLost method.
isBroken() - Method in class model.Brick
This method is to check if the brick is broken or not.
isDone() - Method in class model.Wall
This method checks if the number of brick left is 0.
isDoneTest() - Method in class model.WallTest
This method tests for isDone method.
isExitClicked() - Method in class model.HomeMenuModel
This method is to tell the calling method whether the so-called "Exit button" is clicked.
isGaming() - Method in class model.GameTimer
This method tells the calling method whether the game is starting ot not.
isGaming() - Method in class view.GameFrame
This method tells the calling method whether the user is playing the game (mainly for testing purpose).
isGamingTest() - Method in class model.GameTimerTest
This method tests for isGaming method.
isInfoClicked() - Method in class model.HomeMenuModel
This method is to tell the calling method whether the so-called "Info button" is clicked.
isShowPauseMenu() - Method in class model.GameBoardModel
This method is to tell the calling method whether pause menu is shown.
isStartClicked() - Method in class model.HomeMenuModel
This method is to tell the calling method whether the so-called "Start button" is clicked.
